translations: n.舌头，语言（tongue 复数形式）

phrs.translation: ◎(猎狗追踪或发现猎物时)狂吠，吠叫[亦作 throw tongue]

sentences.sentence: Great tongues of flame shot up here and there.
Their tongues are hanging out, they are hungry to-night.
sentences.translation: 他们的舌头伸着，今晚他们饿了。

sentences.sentence: But our tongues are inaccurate instruments as far as flavor is concerned.
sentences.translation: 但就味道而言，我们的舌头不是准确的工具。
